snippet.title: The Mortuary Assistant - Definitive Edition
snippet.description:
The Mortuary Assistant is coming to all consoles on August 2nd! On the second anniversary of the launch of The Mortuary Assistant, the definitive edition launches in two weeks bringing new haunts, new bodies, embalming only mode, stability and bug fixes, and more!

Those who have purchased the game on Steam or Switch will automatically update to Definitive Edition on launch day.

Grab The Mortuary Assistant now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1295920/The_Mortuary_Assistant/

Follow DreadXP to get updates
https://x.com/DreadXPGames

Follow the developer DarkStone Digital
https://x.com/DSDigitalDev
